com.github.macgregor.alexandria.maven

Class AlexandriaMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.github.macgregor.alexandria.maven.AlexandriaMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConvertMojo, IndexMojo, SyncMojo

    public abstract class AlexandriaMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Base class which handles most of the work of mapping Maven input parameters to an initialized Alexandria context.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String configPath
      Path to the Alexandria Config file to load/save to, generally .alexandria in the project execution root directory.
      protected boolean disclaimerFooterEnabled
      Whether Alexandria should add a footer to all converted files warning readers they are not reading the source document.
      protected String disclaimerFooterPath
      Optional path to a custom (markdown) file to use as the footer added to documents.
      protected List<String> excludes
      File exclude glob patterns to use when searching for documents to index.
      protected boolean failBuild
      Whether or not to fail the overall maven build if the plugin execution fails.
      protected List<String> includes
      File include glob patterns to use when searching for documents to index.
      protected List<String> inputs
      Paths to use when searching for documents to index.
      protected String outputPath
      Path to output converted documents to.
      protected Integer timeout
      Timeout in seconds for each rest call to the remote.

    • Field Detail

      • configPath

        @Parameter(property="alexandria.configPath")
protected String configPath
        Path to the Alexandria Config file to load/save to, generally .alexandria in the project execution root directory. Maven Property: alexandria.configPath Maps to: Context.configPath Defaults to: MavenSession.getExecutionRootDirectory()/.alexandria (${session.executionRootDirectory}/.alexandria)

      • outputPath

        @Parameter(property="alexandria.outputPath",
           defaultValue="${project.build.directory}/alexandria")
protected String outputPath
        Path to output converted documents to. Generally target/alexandria Maven Property: alexandria.outputPath Maps to: Context.outputPath Defaults to: ${project.build.directory}/alexandria

      • inputs

        @Parameter(property="alexandria.inputs")
protected List<String> inputs
        Paths to use when searching for documents to index. By default its the project base dir meaning the entire project repo will be searched. Maven Property: alexandria.inputs Maps to: Context.searchPath Defaults to: MavenSession.getExecutionRootDirectory() (${session.executionRootDirectory})

      • includes

        @Parameter(property="alexandria.includes")
protected List<String> includes
        File include glob patterns to use when searching for documents to index. By default it will search for markdown files (*.md). For more details on acceptable patterns see:
        See Also:
        FileSystem.getPathMatcher(String), org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.WildcardFileFilter, PathFinder.GlobFileFilter, Maven Property: alexandria.includes Maps to: {@link Context#include} Defaults to: Alexandria default ("*.md")

      • excludes

        @Parameter(property="alexandria.excludes")
protected List<String> excludes
        File exclude glob patterns to use when searching for documents to index. By default there are no exclude patterns, so only the include patterns are used when matching files. For more details on acceptable patterns see:
        See Also:
        FileSystem.getPathMatcher(String), org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.WildcardFileFilter, PathFinder.GlobFileFilter, Maven Property: alexandria.excludes Maps to: {@link Context#exclude} Defaults to: Alexandria default (none)

      • timeout

        @Parameter(property="alexandria.timeout",
           defaultValue="30")
protected Integer timeout
        Timeout in seconds for each rest call to the remote. Maven Property: alexandria.timeout Maps to: Config.RemoteConfig.requestTimeout Defaults to: 30 seconds

      • failBuild

        @Parameter(property="alexandria.failBuild",
           defaultValue="false")
protected boolean failBuild
        Whether or not to fail the overall maven build if the plugin execution fails. If set to false, any errors encountered will be logged at warning level. Maven Property: alexandria.failBuild Defaults to: false

      • disclaimerFooterEnabled

        @Parameter(property="alexandria.disclaimerFooterEnabled",
           defaultValue="true")
protected boolean disclaimerFooterEnabled
        Whether Alexandria should add a footer to all converted files warning readers they are not reading the source document. Maven Property: alexandria.disclaimerFooterEnabled Maps to: Context.disclaimerFooterEnabled Defaults to: true

      • disclaimerFooterPath

        @Parameter(property="alexandria.disclaimerFooterPath")
protected String disclaimerFooterPath
        Optional path to a custom (markdown) file to use as the footer added to documents. Maven Property: alexandria.disclaimerFooterPath Maps to: Context.disclaimerFooterPath Defaults to: null (use Alexandria default)

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlexandriaMojo

        public AlexandriaMojo()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public Alexandria init()
                throws IOException
        Initialize the Alexandria context from the Maven plugin parameters for implementing mojo classes to use.
        Returns:
        initialized Context
        Throws:
        IOException - Alexandria metadata file cannot be loaded properly, (see Context.load(String)

      • logContext

        public void logContext()
        Debug logging of Maven plugin configuration.

      • isExecutionRoot

        public boolean isExecutionRoot()
        Test if the Maven plugin is being executed from the **local** root project directory, which can be important for multimodule maven projects. If executed from a child project, rather than the parent, execution root will be false. This takes in to consideration using remote parents (e.g. spring-boot-starters). This is meant to find the local base parent directory.
        Returns:
        true if executed from the local base project dir, false if executed in a child project.

      • rootDir

        public String rootDir()
        Walks the MavenProject to find the base dir. Note: I cant recall why I used this over MavenProject.getBasedir(). Be sure to javadocs early, kids.
        Returns:
